price: Hayo ni kwa sababu Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mlinzi wa walio amini. Na makafiri hawana mlinzi.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ
footnotes: Malipo hayo ndio ushindi wa Waumini na kushindwa nguvu makafiri, ni kwa sababu hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni rafiki mlinzi wa walio amini na ndiye Mwenye kuwanusuru; na makafiri hawana rafiki mlinzi wa kuwanusuru wala kuwakinga na kuangamia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha mawlā alladhīna āmanū wa-anna al-kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
